policies.involuntary_refund:
Passengers are eligible for an involuntary refund in the following cases:
• Flight is advanced by 15 minutes or more
• Flight is delayed by 30 minutes or more
• Flight or route is cancelled

Passenger options:
1. Change of date or flight without penalty or fare difference, within ticket validity.
2. Full refund to the original form of payment.

Processing Requirements:
• If more than 72 hours before departure: agency may process directly in GDS.
• If less than 72 hours before departure: SKY handles rebooking automatically; agents must not take action until revalidation is complete.
• If an ancillary EMD-A is attached: SKY will re-associate it if <72h; agents may do so >72h.
• Reissue must be manual/historical, with penalty removed from mask.
• Mandatory endorsement code: "W04" must be entered in both reissue and refund forms.
• Failure to comply (e.g., class misuse or missing endorsement) may trigger ADM issuance.

To request a full refund via ARC/BSP (RI):
• Use reason code "W04" in the refund reason field.
• Credit Note must be included for local tax compliance.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
✅ Voluntary Changes:
• All fares allow date, time, and route change per fare conditions.
• Change fee + fare difference applies for Basic, Light, Standard, Max.
• Max Flex: No penalty—only fare difference charged.

✅ Airport Standby:
• Earlier Flight: Free change up to 2h before original flight—subject to availability.
• Later Flight: Free change up to 2h after original flight—subject to availability.

✅ Involuntary Reissue:
• Allowed for IRROPS within same route.
• Change must occur within 60 days (or earlier, if requested).
policies.voluntary_refund:
✅ 24-Hour Policy:
• Full refund or cancellation allowed within 24 hours of booking if flight is ≥7 days from departure.

✅ Involuntary Refunds:
• If flight is canceled, delayed significantly, or re-routed without consent.
• If arrival delay exceeds 4+ hours to final destination (for U.S. flights).
• Refund includes base fare, taxes, and unused ancillaries.

❌ Most fares (Basic, Light, Standard, Max) are non-refundable unless involuntary.
✅ Max Flex Fare is fully refundable.

✈️ Reimbursable fees:
• 100% of boarding/airport taxes if flight unused.
• Passenger must apply within fare conditions or as governed by local law.
policies.medical_refund:
✅ Waivers allowed in cases of:
• Flight cancellation or delay (IRROPS)
• Medical emergencies with documentation
• Death of passenger or close family member (with proof)

❌ Waivers not allowed for voluntary changes outside fare rules.
✉️ U.S. support requests must go through Sky’s U.S. office per DOT compliance.
policies.name_change:
✅ One name change allowed:
• Up to 24h before departure
• Change fee varies by fare
• Original flight details remain unchanged
• All products/services transfer to new name
• Must be processed via 'Manage Your Flight' portal

🆓 Name typo correction: Free if reported within 24h of booking.
❌ Change does not allow passenger transfer across reservations.
policies.group_booking:
• Groups: 10+ passengers
• Deposit and deadlines apply
• Name list and TSA info required 30 days before travel
• 10% reduction allowed without penalty
• No name changes allowed after issuance—only corrections per policy
• All group travel must be roundtrip together.
policies.infant_policy:
• Infants must be ≥7 days old (≥2 days with medical waiver)
• One lap infant per adult
• Two strollers allowed free of charge
• Infant fare may vary by route
• Separate seat purchase allowed for car seat
• Child restraint device must meet aircraft safety standards.
policies.baggage_policy:
🧳 Cabin:
• Handbag: 25x35x45 cm, max 10kg
• Carry-on: 25x35x55 cm, max 10kg (if fare includes it)

🧳 Hold:
• Max dimensions: 158cm linear, max 23kg
• Overweight: subject to route-based surcharge

🎸 Special Items:
• Musical instruments: max 23kg, up to 230cm (300cm for surfboards/TVs)
• Sports gear: bicycle, surfboard, ski, etc. allowed with packing requirements
• Strollers free (2 pieces)

🐶 Pets:
• PETC: dogs/cats ≥12 weeks, ≤10kg incl. carrier, 4 max per flight
• AVIH: dogs/cats/birds up to 45kg (Chile/Peru), 32kg elsewhere
• Restricted breeds must travel in cabin (with waiver letter)
• Dangerous breeds: AVIH only, max 6 months age, sealed container
• U.S. flights: Only service animals allowed in cabin
policies.seat_request_policy:
• Five categories: First Row, Fast Exit, Up Front, Extra-Space, Standard
• Standard seats assigned randomly unless paid
• No emergency exit seats for: minors, PRMs, pregnant pax, PETC, non-Spanish/English speakers
• All seat fees non-refundable if changed at airport.
• Seat selection transferred automatically during valid reissues.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
✅ Voiding allowed:
• Within 24 hours of purchase if flight is ≥7 days out
• Free of charge
• After 24h window → refund/reissue rules apply
• Must be canceled through original channel of purchase.

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
